metadata.creator: Rockstargames
metadata.description:
The Bully Scholarship Edition - Original Soundtrack Album, created by Rockstargames.

The list of the songs is the next:
01-Bully Main Theme
02-Here's To You Miss Phillips
03-Punishment
04-Help Gary
05-Comic Klepto
06-Beach Rumble
07-Chase Adult
08-Chase Prefects
09-Sneaking On A Date
10-Defender Of The Castle
11-Vendetta Nerds
12-Vendetta Greasers
13-Vendetta Preps
14-Cheating Time
15-Defend Bucky
16-Chase Police
17-Hattrick vs. Galloway
18-Shop Class
19-Russell In The Hole
20-Vendetta Jocks
21-Fighting Johnny Vincent
22-Vendetta Dropouts
23-Final Showdown
24-Carnival Date
25-School's Out
26-Welcome To Bullworth
metadata.subject: Bully Scholarship Edition Soundtrack - Soundtrack Videogame
metadata.title: Bully Original Soundtrack
